    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Description copied from class: Core
        Called first (after initDisplay, initGraphics, and initAudio), used to initialize all resources, and for whatever you wish to do for initialization. Runs on a seperate thread, while the main Thread continues to the game loop.
        Specified by:
        init in class Core

      • update

        public void update(float delta)
        Description copied from class: Core
        Called once every frame, and used to handle all logic. It is suggested that you check that initialization has passed before you use resources.
        Specified by:
        update in class Core

      • render

        public void render(Graphics g)
        Description copied from class: Core
        Called once every frame, and used to render everything, via Graphics g. It is suggested that you check that initialization has passed before you use resources.
        Specified by:
        render in class Core
